creator: lbkm@post12.tele.dk
text:
I have just run the apache_2.0.48-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi but at the end it give 
me the following error (OS 10048)only one socket-addresse can be used at the 
time. make_sock: could not bind to address:0.0.0.0:80

After this error there are not created any error.log.

I have tried to change to a different IP address with no luck. 

There are no Apache2 service running and if i try to install (apache -k 
install) i get the same error.

Hope you can help me.
Best regards
Bo Krag-Møller

ps. I running XP with no outstanding updates.

creator: erik@codefaktor.de
text:
This sounds more like a configuration problem than a bug. Are you really sure that nothing else is 
listening on port 80 (e.g. PWS/IIS)?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 23045 ***
